pressrelation.item21: a refuge for goldfish at the Paris Aquarium. A great example of the many press coverage from the following press release. This subject, which I decided to deal with during a no news period, created a national and international buzz. We achieved no less than 254 media coverage in 1 month, compared to an average of 52 for the other months. The numerous videos, numerous articles and publications have significantly increased the number of visitors to the aquarium during this period.
